message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth $120 to you. Considering its true value and aiming to achieve a fair deal, I would like to propose a price of $100 for this product. This offers you a great opportunity to acquire it at a reasonable discount compared to its market value. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget.
